gist.summary: Updated Google Summer of Code (GSoC) documentation and contributing guidelines to help new contributors get started.
gist.impact: Prospective GSoC participants will find clearer instructions and a unified README for easier onboarding.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee acting as a friendly guide or librarian, setting up a welcome stand with books and maps for new students (contributors). Represents the updated documentation and welcoming atmosphere for GSoC.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee setting up a wooden welcome sign and organizing pixelated guidebooks. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'GSoC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee setting up a wooden welcome sign and organizing pixelated guidebooks. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'GSoC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
